definitions.explanation_en: A surname of Scottish and English origin, commonly found in historical and contemporary contexts as a family name.
definitions.explanation_cn: 苏格兰和英格兰起源的姓氏，常见于历史及当代语境中作为家族姓氏。
definitions.example_en: Dr. Reid is the lead researcher on the project.
definitions.example_cn: 雷德博士是该项目的主要研究员。
